alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:00AM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...Now until 11 PM today. The steadiest snow is expected this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, including along Interstates 25 and 90. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
